title: What artist(s) do you listen to and what songs do you recommend from them? - Quora

response.answer_text: My kind of music is rap. I’m not a big Fan of mumble/sound cloud rap, I like lyrical rappers. So like eminem, logic, Joyner etc… songs i recommend from them eminem 1. The ringer a great diss aimed at the rappers and critics hating on him these days eminem 2. Lose yourself one of the most famous eminem songs and a good rap if you like that sorta stuff. logic 1. Homicide feat eminem a great diss aimed at the younger generation of mumble rappers logic 2. Ballin’ a good song from the movie uncle drew and a catchy tune. joyner Lucas 1. Lucky you feat eminem. It's about a zombie apocalypse copying people… e.g. Meaning the younger generation of rappers copying others. joyner Lucas 2. Isis feat logic a great rap filled with rhymes rapping about Isis and stuff. thank you ✌🏻

here’s my spotify profile if you want to check it out so i don’t have to keep updating this answer(i’m lazy😂): Molly Hool here are some of my faves tho: Nothing but thieves top songs: Itch, Hanging(i’d recommend watching this one live it’s incredible), amsterdam, ban all the music, i was just a kid Kasabian Top songs: Club foot, fire, underdog, velociraptor, thick as thieves Red hot chili peppers Top songs: dani california, can’t stop, under the bridge, around the world, otherside, higher ground(stevie wonder cover) So these are good bands but i also like just random songs from random smaller artists instead of listing these here’s my playlist for these: Stuff no one knows, a playlist by Molly Hool on Spotify hope you enjoy
